knimeNode.name: Encryption
knimeNode.shortDescription: Encrypts selected columns from input data set using DES cryptographic algorithm. ImpressiveCode Depress

fullDescription.intro: Selected columns from input data set, which are plain text, will be encrypted. Selected columns from input data set, which are already encrypted, will be decrypted. The same cryptographic key has to be used for encryption and decryption process, because of symmetric cipher algorithm usage (DES). Potentially encrypted columns from input data set are marked, so they can be distinguished from plain text columns. Output data set has the same structure as input data set - only difference is, that selected columns are encrypted or decrypted.
fullDescription.option: Section, where columns, which will be treated by cryptographic algorithm, can be selected.
Columns, which will be not treated by cryptographic algorithm.
Columns, which will be treated by cryptographic algorithm.
Column(s) with given name will be searched in appropriate column set.
All search hints will be automatically selected.
Section, where file with cryptographic key can be selected.
Path to the file, which contains cryptographic key.
File with cryptographic key will be generated automatically and its path will be loaded.

ports.outPort: Output data set with selected columns treated by cryptographic algorithm.
